channel.title: packaging on Julien Pivotto
channel.description: Recent content in packaging on Julien Pivotto

item.title: EPEL 7 released
item.description: EPEL 7 has been released. It contains interesting packages: ansible (orchestration) collectd (monitoring) mariadb-galera (database replication) mate (gnome 2 fork) mcollective (orchestration) munin (monitoring; version 2) puppet (configuration management, latest version) sl :) varnish (caching) And obviously a lot of other stuff to discover. EPEL wiki page List of packages Puppet module stahnma-epel

item.title: Paludis, a package manager
item.description: This weekend, the Fosdem was still full of geeks and a lot of discussions happened. Package managers were still in the discussions, while a lot of projects try to fix their problems: FPM tito bower omnibus tar :-) Let me explain you some stuff about the Exherbo package manager, Paludis. It is a performant package manager, which build packages from source, and it does not solve all the traditional problems related to the package managers.
